column1: In  view  of  the  aforesaid  Evidence  of  the  Grama  Niladhari,  it  is  observable  that  either  he  was
deliberately  lying  to  Court  by  suppressing  that  he  was  unaware  of  breaking  open  of  the  shop
premises  in  question,  or  the  Appellant  has  suppressed  the  dispute  regarding  the  shop  premises
taken place on the 21.05.1994, when he was obtaining the said letter 2ව3 from the Grama Niladhari.
However, it is clear that the said Grama Niladhari had issued the letter 2ව3 without inquiring into
the request made by the Appellant.
